categories.name: Gameplay
categories.description: Change the way your world works

categories.name: Add-On Creators
categories.description: For creators of game packs and other Add-Ons

experiments.title: Villager Trade Rebalancing (since 1.20.30)
experiments.description: Contains updated trades for villages for the purpose of rebalancing

experiments.title: Drop 3 2025 (since 1.21.100)
experiments.description: Adds copper golems, along with copper tools, armor, chests, and nuggets.

experiments.title: Custom Biomes (since 1.16.100)
experiments.description: Create custom biomes and change world generation

experiments.title: Beta APIs (since 1.16.210)
experiments.description: Use "-beta" versions of API modules in Add-On packs

experiments.title: Experimental Creator Camera Features (since 1.21.70)
experiments.description: Enables the use of the latest custom camera features

experiments.title: Data-Driven Jigsaw Structures (since 1.21.50)
experiments.description: Loads Jigsaw Structures from the behavior pack worldgen folder
